alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 11 at 2:30PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down weakened trees and branches. Localized power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind will begin Monday morning, but the strongest winds are not expected until Monday afternoon.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects including inflatable Christmas decorations. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
